= Introduction =

This page illustrates the use of the Google Maps and SIMILE Timeline Javascript APIs

= Google Maps =

  * One [http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=65620&topic=11364 tutorial from Google] describes how to build a [http://code.google.com/articles/support/ezdigitizer.htm simple digitizer] that allows users to point and click over the map, or draw around a particular region and store the geographical coordinates in KML.
  * Another [http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=87134&topic=11364&ctx=sibling tutorial from Google] shows how to create a store locator with PHP, MySQL & Google Maps 

{{{
def fib(n):
  if n == 0 or n == 1:
    return n
  else:
    # This recursion is not good for large numbers.
    return fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
}}}

= SIMILE TimeLine =

{{{
def fib(n):
  if n == 0 or n == 1:
    return n
  else:
    # This recursion is not good for large numbers.
    return fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
}}}
